{ # Template for use when "description" is used # # For integrated extended help uncomment the "MultiContentEntryText" entries, # set the itemHeight for the extended entries to 50 and remove the panel for # "ScreenTemplateDescription4". "templates": { # Simple help with no headings ("flat") # data[1:] = [helpText] "default": (50, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (30, 0), size = (1130, 50), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1) ]), # Simple help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText] # For help entries "default+headings": (50, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (1160, 50), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (30, 0), size = (1130, 50), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2) ]), # Extended help with no headings # data[1:] = [helpText, extendedHelpText] "extended": (50, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (30, 0), size = (1130, 50), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1) # MultiContentEntryText(pos = (75, 25), size = (1085, 50), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2) ]), # Extended help with headings # data[1:] = [heading, None, None] # For heading entries # data[1:] = [None, helpText, extendedHelpText] # For help entries "extended+headings": (50, # itemHeight [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (1160, 50), font = 0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), MultiContentEntryText(pos = (30, 0), size = (1130, 50), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 2) # MultiContentEntryText(pos = (75, 25), size = (1085, 50), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 3) ]), }, "fonts": [gFont("RegularBold", 28), gFont("RegularBold", 26), gFont("RegularBold", 26)], "itemHeight": 50 }
